name: Wrestler
description:
On hit, after combat at Range ≤ 1, (Dex or Luc + 20)% chance this unit may choose one of the following:
 • Move target foe up to two spaces in a cardinal direction (you choose).
 • Apply @{condition:Rattled:[Rattled]} to target foe for one turn.
 • Apply @{condition::[Taunted]} to target foe for one turn.
 • Apply @{const:gbp:[Str -3]} to target foe for one turn.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
